org.xlattice.projmgr

Class BuildElementFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.projmgr.BuildElementFactory

  • public class BuildElementFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods which construct parts of the AntBuild, the object which becomes an Ant build.xml file.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

      • makeAvailableForDep

        public static final Element makeAvailableForDep(java.lang.String libdir,
                          java.lang.String groupId,
                          java.lang.String artifactId,
                          java.lang.String version,
                          java.lang.String type)
        Build an Ant available element for a dependency. The names passed are assumed to be well-formed.
        Parameters:
        libdir - The path in the file system, typically ${lib_dir}/id
        id - Name of the file of interest, without any extension
        artifact - The file extension, typically jar
        Returns:
        The Ant element.
